author: niallp
msg: Further fix for CHAIN-12 - Using JDK 1.4.2_10 ContextBase can be serialized, but JDK 1.4.2_11 (and 1.3.1_04) fail trying to serialize - thanks to Dennis Lundberg for spotting this.
